reviewText: My children (4&5) enjoyed this dvd. I got it thinking it would be more "Christmasy". The cover makes it appear that it would be more holiday in theme. It is not. Nonetheless, my kiddos enjoyed it.
My daughter loves this.  It is a nice length and keeps her attention.
I revived my package thank you my daughter will have her birthday she wants
This is for Christmas, my kids will be excited to watch! Thanks!
Its one of my granddaughters favorites!
thanks for the fast delivery and  great price
All of the items that I bought was great and it was great for christmas present.  The price is affordable at amazon.

This DVD contains two episodes from the Care Bears cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. The Great Giving Holiday (Feature Episode) - A troublemaker tries to spoil the holidays and the Giving Day Pageant.
2. Cheeri-No (Bonus Episode) - While Cheer is busy helping others, she forgets to do her own important job.
can be streamed for free. the description did not give a complete explanation of the content. My daughter loves the carebears though
No Christmas stuff at all, disappointing! Packaging makes it seem like it's a Christmas edition.
Our kids love the Carebears, and this one is a great edition for them to enjoy around Christmas!  Though it is not technically a Christmas movie, it has the right theme, and is appropriate.
It's a fun,  musical,  hilarious,  and sweet movie for any kid.  My daughters fav part is the singing.  I recommend it to any parent with a fun sweet child.
my kiddo purchased it , she enjoyed it

my daughter absolutely loves this DVD. after watching it she sat there and said mama its ok to give to our friends when they are nice to us. she never would have thought twice about not giving something to someone. good lessons in this.
